writer.name: 保洛·萨克拉门托 Paulo Sacramento

director.name: 保洛·萨克拉门托 Paulo Sacramento

this_title: O Prisioneiro da Grade de Ferro
introduction: A year before shutting down the Carandiru House of Detention in São Paulo, the largest in Latin America at that time, some prisoners learned to use video cameras. For seven months, they documented their daily lives behind bars, marked by overcrowded cells, drug dealing, prayers, fights and solitude.源自：http://etudoverdade.com.br/en/filme/51590-O-Prisioneiro-da-Grade-de-Ferro-Auto-Retratos
foreign_title: O Prisioneiro da Grade de Ferro
